description: An ancient river of the Troad, possibly to be identified with the modern Umurbey Çayı.
details: BAtlDir provides the "modern" name "Ulu Dere", but the geometry labeled on BAtlas is clearly the river now referred to in OSM and Geonames as "Umurbey Çayı".

properties.description: Location based on OpenStreetMap. BAtlDir provides the "modern" name "Ulu Dere", but the geometry labeled on BAtlas is clearly the river now referred to in OSM and Geonames as "Umurbey Çayı".
properties.title: OSM Location: modern Umurbey Çayı

names.description: BAtlDir provides the "modern" name "Ulu Dere", but the geometry labeled on BAtlas is clearly the river now referred to in OSM and Geonames as "Umurbey Çayı".

references.formattedCitation: Marc Wick, and Christophe Boutreux. GeoNames, 2005. https://www.geonames.org/.

names.description: BAtlDir provides this modern name, and Roller repeats it, but the geometry labeled in BAtlas 51 is clearly the same river as that now named "Umurbey Çayı" in both OSM and Geonames.
